website_summaries.verdict: If you need a small table, you'll find this model easy to use and clean; but it's not as practical or versatile as others on our shortlist.
pros: Small size is suitable for use in small spaces and for individuals and couples
cons: Small size is not as versatile as larger tables

customer_reviews.title: my only complaint with these tables is there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: my only complaint with these tables is there is no way to lock the legs once opened up and if bumped the table tends to start to fold back up. i made a makeshift locking system with wire ties and it solved that issue
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for next to the grill
customer_reviews.text: Our intended purpose for this was to have a table next to the grill to set cooking tools and trays on. We wanted something that can fold easily, something that wasn’t tippy on bricks, and was a good size and height. This little table fit the bill! It’s very sturdy, and is big enough without being cumbersome. It folds flat and hangs on a couple hooks to stay out of the way. Thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MommaJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table
customer_reviews.text: I'm the owner of Nicolla's Opulent Events, an event planning and decor company based in metro Atlanta. I used this little table for my cards and brochures and raffle items at a bridal show. It was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLLA

customer_reviews.title: Great table!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful small table. Was pleasantly surprised when I received it. This light weight table only needs one hand to carry and to open. Well made and sturdy too. I place my table top telescope on it. I really can't say enough about how much I love this table. I would highly recommend purchasing one. It's also so easy to store and to travel with. When I'm not using it I just slide it behind the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Hardworkingwoman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light, folding table for eating breakfast outside or use at the beach. So far, this table has performed perfectly. The top is thick and durable. The legs are sturdy. It folds up and out of the way easily. I can carry it with one hand. I'm not sure why others have a problem with the table collapsing on them. I've deliberately tried to do that several times outside and in my house, but it continues to stand solidly until I fold it up. Maybe there's been a design improvement recently? Regardless, it's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A Sacramento Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect fit for my guest room. It is also very sturdy but light weight enough for easy manuverability. I painted mine with a whimsy stencil design to go with the bedroom. I highly recommend this table!
customer_reviews.author: Style Specific

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy table that folds flat and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I am in the wedding business. On many occasions, I need a table for an outdoor or beach wedding. I had a chipboard table for several years but it is no longer "nice looking". I needed a table that was going to be light in weight, durable and good looking. I am very pleased with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Avis Shiveler Brangan

customer_reviews.title: Table for Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: We have a busy toddler, a baby on the way, a wild puppy, and another dog. We still wanted a real Christmas tree but knew it wasn’t wise with our active family this year nor the upcoming years. I found this table and we bought a smaller tree. It is sturdy enough to hold the tree fully decorated and stand full of water. It was just big enough to fit the stand centered on the table but no put any presents under it. It was perfect for our family! Can’t wait for next years elevated tree.
customer_reviews.author: Molly B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little table!
customer_reviews.text: This was such an unexpectedly good buy! I just wanted a light, simple little table for my back patio, and this exceeded my expectations. It's so light and easy to fold that I often toss it in the back of my car along with my folding chair when I go for socially distanced hangouts with friends, and it's sturdy enough to use for the outdoor communion services we've been doing at my church, where I trust it to hold the heavy pottery communion set my previous congregation gifted me. I might even buy another one because it's just so handy to have on hand, and it folds up so nicely it's easy to store just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Day Hefner

customer_reviews.title: They hold up well...
customer_reviews.text: Great table. It truly is sturdy and pretty easy to fold (mind the fingers). I have both the round and rectangle one. I came back to purchase a second round one, so that says something. Aesthetically it’s not fancy like a wooden one would be, but I use it outside and inside for different purposes and they have held up really well for the past year of every day use. Worth the money. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: zonlyone

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tables
customer_reviews.text: We had a party and needed to maintain social distancing so we bought these little tables and some folding chairs. I agree with other reviewers that they can easily collapse so to be safe we put zip ties on one leg and they were rock solid all night long.
customer_reviews.author: ukulele lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small patio
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a really old table on a small patio & had been looking for a while so was happy to find this. When I first opened it I thought it was going to be too big, as the patio is pretty small, but once I got it outside, it was fine. It's a tiny bit wider & taller than the one I had, which is actually better, and its sturdy enough. I'm not bothering with a tablecloth since it's outside & I can just wipe it down.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and big enough
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Beautiful on our wedding day! Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Nigeria

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: We needed a table for intermittent use on our balcony that would be sturdy but easy to move and store. We found it in this product. It has a very generic look but is highly functional. The molded plastic top is very strong and the table legs are sturdy and well balanced. It folds in a snap and is easy to set aside in seconds. The coatings on the steel legs look to be good. We have it on a covered balcony so it will see it's share of salt water moisture. Time will tell if it can hold up to the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T.

customer_reviews.title: Craft fair tables
customer_reviews.text: I use these at craft fairs for my crochet cats. They are so lightweight and easy to use. And seemed stable when people bumped them walking around them. I use them at home for temporary seating and craft projects. They fold down nicely and are about 4 inches wide when flat and not quite 4 feet tall from floor when sitting on the edge. I have 3 so I have them behind a dresser. Easy to pull out by the feet when needed.
customer_reviews.author: lmh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & well made..
customer_reviews.text: This table is well made & very sturdy. Easy to set up, easy to unfold and very easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Bucktowner

customer_reviews.title: It's something very useful to have tucked away for those moments
customer_reviews.text: I like this table. It has many uses. I bought to use for my sewing machine but found it now using for my sons zoom class drawing and craft activities. Its so easy to fold and light weight. it gets dirty very easy but at the same time stains can be easily cleaned with ajax. I would buy again to have in church sometime in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Greene

customer_reviews.title: Can’t lock legs secure to keep table level
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to lock the legs so the table top tips. I put packing tape to hold legs steady but now I can’t fold it. I called Flash Furniture as I think they omitted something in the box to lock the legs and they were no help. Pretty rude. Told me to call Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Casita RV!
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled a Casita RV and replaced a permanent 24” square dinette with this. It is PERFECT. The perfect height, the perfect size, and it’s portable. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Taxi

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Study, flat top and folds flat for storage. I put a tablecloth and small Christmas tree on top and worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, but my only gripe is, the legs won't lock. I drilled holes in the legs and put locking pins in place, like the ones in speaker tripods. *******Update******* I drilled a hole in the leg to place a safety pin from one of my old tripod stand.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a hightop!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I thought these were high tops! I didn’t read the description thoroughly:( Inalready have 2 of the same brand high tops and love them, so I was looking for 2 more. Still like these for entertaining. Great for a small space w two chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jill McManus

customer_reviews.title: Great table, I just added an extra little bolt to make super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this to display my brochures at conferences, with the black elastic cover (sold with it) is very elegant. I just drilled a little hole through one leg and the flat tab that it lands against, and insert a little bolt and nut through both after I unfold the table to hold this table very solidly in the fully open position. It took me 5 minutes to do. Super portable, very stable now, and I will use it for many years to come, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable tables
customer_reviews.text: We purchased multiple of these tables for use at a handful of events we hosted this past year. They are sturdy, easy to fold/unfold and fairly lightweight. I just wish there was a locking mechanism when table is unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: OCDog

customer_reviews.title: Great small table! Not tall table.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you look at the measurements because I thought I ordered the tall tables and this one is actually smaller like a card table. It worked out for my event but it didn't read the measurements just assumed that it was a tall table like my others that I bought somewhere else. The tables are great though. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Very even & Level (no wedge nec) folds & unfolds easily//feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. As soon as I got one a couple of days ago to stand my 26" flat screen TV on in my bedroom, I ordered another one for another room. It stands very flat and even ( I have ordered other tables where I had to stick a small wedge under 1 or 2 legs to even it out--not the case with this table). I also like that it feels sturdy to me and is very easy to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: LIVING IN NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good multi purpose use tables
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace TV trays we rarely use. Now these can be used inside if we want, or outside as well. We recently used them for a big party for people to set their drinks on outside. Good basic inexpensive table. I like that they are round and not rectangle. The round shape is fun.
customer_reviews.author: shoe_girl!

customer_reviews.title: Useful and cost efficient
customer_reviews.text: This foldable table is uber convenient. I pull it out when doing heavy dusting to place items upon, instead of on the floor or shoving items side to side. Also convenient when sorting through a junk drawer. Even used it as a temporary work desk with my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: TM customer

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: This table size was just what I was looking for since I have a kitchenette in my studio. I don't like how the legs stick out and I seem to be tripping over them when I am getting up at times. Just something I'm going to have to get used to. Good price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Handy
customer_reviews.text: What a great little table this is! It is very sturdy, lightweight but not tipsy, and a handy size for many activities. NO assembly! Yay. I bought it to put our small Christmas tree on, but my husband has stolen it from me already for his photography purposes. He did wait until after Christmas, though.
customer_reviews.author: Freddigirl24

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Folds flat. Glad to see legs are permanently and solidly fastened - no “popping out” at inopportune times. Easily stored under bed. Perfect size for many of my display needs.
customer_reviews.author: Artdoll

customer_reviews.title: Terrific table.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this table. I bought it to use during the holidays for a beverage station and it worked out great. I thought that I'd only be using this for parties but we've found it so handy that we use it quite a bit. It is super easy to open and nice and sturdy. I would recommend this table!
customer_reviews.author: MC in San Dieg

customer_reviews.title: Nice small table
customer_reviews.text: Using it as computer table in my small living room..it works great..put cable Ties around legs to be sure it didn't fold..worked great and looks good with a nice round table cloth..
customer_reviews.author: Gail J. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small break room
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my small business breakroom. It's very easy to store and 3 people can sit at it. My only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because it's hard to clean. I haven't found the right cleaner to get stains off. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2read

customer_reviews.title: sturdy table, love that it folds
customer_reviews.text: sturdy table, love that it folds, purchased a few to use at an event as small bistro style tables and they worked great. I used a standard round 84 in tablecloth on it and I think it fit fine. They arrived quickly and were packaged well
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I like this table. Adjustable and very portable. I do Tarot readings at events and this works great! Someone recently asked me if they could put a 147 pound machine on this. (I lost the email.) It's sturdy but that might be pushing it. I don't have a 147 pound machine to test that with...
customer_reviews.author: G. Shunk

customer_reviews.title: Great portable fold-up table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to be used whenever a temporary small table is needed, it works great. Folds and unfolds easily and is very sturdy. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this little table. It was multiple uses. Next to my bed for extra space for plates my purse books letters. Or for crafts. Very easy to clean & very sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: A great boy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific boy it looks really really great on my patio with a nice scrape flowers in the center if I had a camera you would see a beautiful picture and it falls so easy a child can do it. Don’t hesitate just buy it you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Handy table
customer_reviews.text: We wanted it as a bedside table for my husband since he has a bed that rises and it was perfect and I can see so many uses for this table
customer_reviews.author: C. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Satiesfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Great handy dandy table. I use it at my students piano recitals to put the programs on with a lovely bouquet of flowers. Good product. Great service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ida Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I would call "granite" but plastic
customer_reviews.text: When I saw it was a "granite" top, I thought it would be heavy, but it's more of a plastic top. It's nice to have as an extra place to put napkins, plates, silverware and cups for dinner parties.
customer_reviews.author: G. Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic picnic must.
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy, yet sturdy. We use this to have dining nights in the parking lotduring the pandemic. We can eat our meals hot and it's the perfect height to sit on the back of the SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Cmor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for my daughter to use in her room to put her small Christmas tree on so the dog can’t chew it. Will use it as a side table going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon East

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a gold box deal so the price was very right. Table is exactly what I wanted and seems to be well made. Sets up in seconds. I would consider this medium to light weight so nothing too heavy on top and it should last for a long time. I'm more than happy with this table and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JM Bunkin

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: The table is perfect. This is exactly what I needed for my new small office space. Sturdy, durable material. Looks easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, lightweight and easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table. Served the purpose for what I needed it for and made the room look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesusisreal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Have this out on my deck. Nice little table has stood up good out side for 2 seasons now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 24" round table
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to assemble. Sturdy, light to handle but not flimsy. Thick molded top with nice smooth surface. Easy to fold and takes very little space widthwise to store. I paid $20 for this item and it's worth every penny. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ross davies-hooper

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and perfect  height
customer_reviews.text: Great table . Very sturdy and easy to open and collapsible is very easy. I use it for my promotion table .I carry it very easily to my jobs .love it
customer_reviews.author: gina radice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This table is just what I needed. Simple, easy to fold and unfold, light weight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Never received it post office never sucks
customer_reviews.text: Never received this table I really liked it and would have love to get some I could use it post office sucks
customer_reviews.author: GV Moore

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table! It is sturdy, easy to fold and, more importantly, easy to store. It comfortably holds two dinner plates and two drinks. I use it as a side table for snacks. It is very easy to clean and you can dress it up with a mini tablecloth. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great overall value for Cocktail Tables
customer_reviews.text: The tables came quickly, were the perfect hight for eating at and very comfortable for 2 people. With a tablecloth they look very nice for an event.
customer_reviews.author: Ryleigh

customer_reviews.title: Came in broken :(
customer_reviews.text: This table came in broken. I have an event in six days and this table was supposed to hold some of my products. I’ll be sending it back for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Bistro
customer_reviews.text: Cute little fold-up bistro table. Use it on the deck when there's just two of us and then put it away. Easy to set up and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: nadler369

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Amazon for affordable items as stores are closed during the Pandemic
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for my project !!! Sturdy and foldable for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Protective parent/ to protect my identity

customer_reviews.title: great little utility table
customer_reviews.text: No problems with unpacking - very hardy little table great for outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Toni5000

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very sturdy, already put together. Opens up or folds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shalooop

customer_reviews.title: Great tray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tray table to finish off my Christmas decorating! I needed something to put in the corner that I would cover up and this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia L. Williams

customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown, it's sturdy and I'm glad I have something portable :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G Odom

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Table does not have a lock, had to use tape to prevent the table from folding when using spandex table cloth
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: The table doesn't have a locking mechanism so it kept folding over when the items were set unbalanced
customer_reviews.author: Debraca Holmes

customer_reviews.title: A perfect size table
customer_reviews.text: A perfect size. Have bought 2 already. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Not the size stated, to late to send back
customer_reviews.text: I request bar height and this is not and the table cloth that was suggested to go with did not fit well
customer_reviews.author: Annette Shelia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: 24in. White folding table.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for height for a work table next to our grill. Sturdier than I thought it would be. So easy to fold up. Will also come in handy in our dining room with a tablecloth on it for a few Side dishes during the the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: SueL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking and you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking and color changed for a cup of chocolate milk placed on the table
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, light weight, strong and beautiful. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: M. A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for a 4' Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for a 4' Christmas tree. It sets up quick and is the right height for my windows to display the tree during the holiday.
customer_reviews.author: jbc549

customer_reviews.title: Handy table to have
customer_reviews.text: A great little table to have handy for the price. Shipped and received on time. Will be using as extra tables for patio party, look like they are study and will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DanceVice

customer_reviews.title: Still great but short
customer_reviews.text: I misread the description I thought it’s the high cocktail tables but these are the shorter ones ... but they still worked
customer_reviews.author: Yana Komaroa

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great small table. Using it for my wedding for my unity sand ceremony. After that I'll be using it from time to time around my home
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Pagonis

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect table for it
customer_reviews.text: We have a small 3' Christmas tree. This is the perfect table for it. Light weight. A breeze to open and clothes. No fumbling with hooks, or hinges. Perfect little table.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet Hook

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 2 tables with a spandex table cover to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 tables with a spandex table cover to use with another bar height table. When I put the spandex cover on the table the legs folded in and the table will not sit flat because the legs do not lock. I did not have this issue with the taller/larger table. I've seen the reviews of people using wire to lock the legs. I will give it a try - but i will need to setup and take down these tables on a continuous basis and would prefer not to have to locking legs.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height and surface space that we needed for our waterfront condo. Very pleased😍
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, the product came in perfect shape, just as described. The table is comfortably high and big enough for two. I'll buy an other one for outside. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariann

customer_reviews.title: Love these little guys
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these by accident and was going to return but so glad I decided to keep them, they are so useful for small projects side tables if needed etc so good
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Read the dimentions!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table and am overall, satisfied with the product. However, due to, admittedly, my own failure to pay attention to the dimensions, it's shorter than I had anticipated. It still worked fine for my purpose but did not provide the aesthetic I had anticipated. Just be mindful of the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: HRH

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: Using it as end table, covered with floor length cover and contrasting topper.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I order I was very satisfied . Need it for a wedding . Perfect \

customer_reviews.title: Great for portability
customer_reviews.text: Super light and the folding mechanics are great. Very sturdy for how light weight it is.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for convenient mobile table.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! As a realtor, I sometimes need a display table at vacant properties. This table is mobile, good value, clean and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Use for food truck 2 people can sit down and eat with any kind fold up chairs
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great table look is perfect for next to BBQ grill.

customer_reviews.title: Check your chairs
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table, but if you want to use it with chairs, make sure they don’t have any horizontal bars as they will probably not for well under the table.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Table doesn’t lock into place and cans be used with the spandex table covers
customer_reviews.author: iToro

customer_reviews.title: Good table!
customer_reviews.text: It is compact, lightweight, and worked for my needs. I used it for an outdoor art festival and bought it with white cover as a package that was suggested by Amazon to buy the two together.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice folding table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these tables to use for an outdoor party. They fit the bill! I would buy again. Just what I needed to give guests a standing eating and drinking space.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for setting our MIA/POW table display up in our American Legion Hall.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Great table, had to reattach one leg but all in all it was a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I needed a small desk to work on! compact!!

customer_reviews.title: Loved this table
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one I got--so I ordered two more. I got a great deal one this one--but now the price has doubled because the seller has left

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...I do wine/beer demos, and this is the perfect size for me to carry into the store and set-up my display.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight portable table and I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little table. I used it initially for a trade show booth. I see many other uses. Light and folds easily.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not 38in high as described. Otherwise acceptable to my planned use.

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open and fairly light. Bought it for craft show table and looks great with table cloth on it.

customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. My table comes with many stains. I feel it is used one.

customer_reviews.title: Great small table
customer_reviews.text: We put this table on our small terrace . It is sturdy easy to clean. And fit the bill for our needs

customer_reviews.title: it is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: it is a great buy .It has so .any uses.I even use it as my sewing machine table.

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 2-Foot Round Granite White Plastic Folding Table
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1If you are looking for the perfect table for that little breakfast nook or just a little extra seating for surprise guests the search is over. This petite sized folding table can be used in banquet halls, cafeterias, or in the home. This table is a great solution for displaying small items, cook-outs on your patio at home or when you're serving snacks around the pool. The portable commercial grade table seats up to 2 adults. Its waterproof, impact and stain resistant top have a 180 pound static load capacity. Non-Locking bar height gray powder coated cross legs fold to transport and store. Non-marring floor caps protect your floor by sliding smoothly when you need to move it. Although designed for both indoor and outdoor use, store indoors and protect the frame from extreme moisture. The 24" Round Granite White Plastic Folding Table is a convenient option for your next home, school or business event.
feature_bullets: Petite tables add that little extra table top space, and can create a perfect area for crafts, working on projects or entertaining. This 24" round folding table seats up to 2 adults and the legs fold for easy transport and storage.
.75" thick granite white table top - waterproof, impact and stain resistant top - non-locking bar height gray powder coated cross legs - protective floor caps
Versatile surface option for parties, trade shows, offices, craft rooms and classrooms
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 24"W x 24"D x 29.375"H
